review:
Not playable on Rift! 

I start to high and can see my hand ca 2 meters on my bottom. No interactions posible.

Reconfig Rift and clean reinstall of the game does not fit anything.

author: {'steamid': '76561198109620591', 'num_games_owned': 822, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1545694965}
review:
A very iteresting game, that starts out as your normal on the rails arcade shooter, ment to kill you as soon as possible, it throws a lot at you from the start with large groups and for the most part gives you inadiquete means of dealing with them to start. my biggest con to the game is having what could only be clasiffied as loud gasps and moans from the onboard ai whenever you get hit.... and thats a lot, as it gets really bothersome after a while..

in short: fun game but lower the volume settings.
